message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value to both of us. I understand its importance to you, valued at $1,500,000, and I aim to ensure this transaction benefits us equally. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you the product at a price of $1,400,000. This offer represents a strategic midpoint between our respective valuations, aiming for mutual satisfaction and success. I look forward to your thoughtful response and the possibility of a fruitful partnership.
